label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ranked All Pickinitial planning phase reduced from 40 to 30 seconds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Private Lobby games now use theCaptains Modecreep spawn timer when in All Pick

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • First rune spawns are now bothBounty Runesthat are twice as effective (50/50 gold/xp to 100/100)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • AllIllusionsnow deal 25% less damage to structures

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee and RangedBarracksbounty reduced from 352-370 to 100-150

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee and Ranged Barracks now give 125 and 75 gold to each player, respectively

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Wardlocation to the right ofRoshanis now pathable

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed a ward location near the Dire ancients that could not be easily seen

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added atreein the river to the left of the Roshan pit entrance

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Granite Golem health reduced from 2000 to 1700

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Granite Golem now has an aura which grants 15% bonus health to its allies

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • MaximumAttack Speedincreased from 500 to 600 (the primary impact of this is on abilities likeWindranger'sFocus FireandUrsa'sOverpower)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • The following abilities no longer have restrictions when cast on Spell Immune Allies:Kunkka'sX Marks The Spot,Magnus'sEmpower,Treant Protector'sLiving Armor, andWarlock'sShadow Word

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • The tooltips forVanguard,Stout Shield,Poor Man's ShieldandCrimson Guardnow reflect their internal proc chance instead of their legacy representation (no actual balance change)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Vision and Fog of War can now be any numerical value, rather than specific intervals (previously it was 0, 64, 192, 320, 448, 576, 704, 800, 832, 960, 1088, 1216, 1344, 1472, 1600, 1728)
    • Previously if you had a vision between the fixed intervals, it would clamp to a fixed value

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml: • Borrowed Timeduration increased from 3/4/5 to 4/5/6

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Greevil's Greedbase bonus gold increased from 4/6/8/10 to 6/8/10/12
  • Greevil's Greed extra bonus gold per stack from 1/2/3/4 to 3
  • Greevil's Greed max bonus gold from 30 to 12/20/28/36
  • Greevil's Greed recent kill window duration increased from 25 to 30

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Battle Hungerduration from 10/12/14/16 to 10
  • Battle Hunger damage from 15/20/25/30 to 16/24/32/40
    • Total damage from 150/240/350/480 over 10/12/14/16 seconds to 160/240/320/400 over 10 seconds
  • Battle Hunger cast range from 900 to 750
  • Battle Hunger movement and slow from 10 to 12%
  • Battle Hunger mana cost from 75/85/95/105 to 75

label: Bane
descriptionHtml: • Nightmarecooldown from 15 to 16/15/14/13

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Call of the Wildnow always provides a Hawk and a Boar at each level, and each now scales per level
  • Hawkhealth from 50/50/100/100 to 40/60/80/100
  • Hawk movement speed from 270/270/400/400 to 250/300/350/400
  • Hawk day sight from 500/500/1600/1600 to 700/1000/1300/1600
  • Hawk night sight from 500/500/1200/1200 to 700/800/900/1000
  • Hawk kill bounty from 30/30/65/65 to 30/40/50/60
  • Boarhealth from 0/400/400/500 to 200/300/400/500
  • Boar base damage from 0/26/26/46 to 15/30/45/60
  • Boar base attack time from 0/1.5/1.5/1 to 1.25
  • Boar poison slow from 0/20/20/35% to 10/20/30/40%

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Added toCaptains Mode
    • Will be enabled next week
  • Bloodrageno longer amplifies outgoing damage if the damage has the no-reflection flag
    • This is similar to howBlademail,Spiked Carapace,Fatal Bonds, etc. work

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml:
• Trackbonus gold for self increased from 150/200/250 to 200/275/350
  • Track cooldown reduced from 10/7/5 to 4

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• BaseArmorreduced from 4 to 2
  • Thunder Claphero slow duration from 4.25 to 4
  • Thunder Clap cooldown from 12 to 13

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml: • Quill Spraystack damage increased from 30 to 30/32/34/36

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml: • Spiderlings' day vision reduced from 1400 to 1100

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Reality Riftdamage increased from 25/50/75/100 to 60/80/100/120
  • Reality Rift mana cost from 70 to 50
  • Phantasmillusion duration increased from 34 to 42

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Test of Faithnow teleports all of your units to you when cast on yourself
    • Has the same delay as when cast on allied heroes
  • Holy Persuasionmax units increased from 1/1/2/3 to 1/2/3/4

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml: • Baseattack rangeincreased from 600 to 630

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Battery Assaultdamage increased from 15/35/55/75 to 20/40/60/80

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Crystal Novaattack speed slow from 20 to 30
  • Frostbitecooldown from 10 to 10/9/8/7
  • Freezing Fieldduration increased from 7 to 10 seconds
  • Freezing Field explosion spawn radius and slow radius increased by 150
  • Freezing Field explosion damage radius increased by 50

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor increased by 1
  • Vacuumpull duration increased from 0.4 to 0.5

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml: • Base attack range increased from 500 to 550

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Strengthgrowth reduced from 2.2 to 1.9

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml:
• Glimpsemana cost rescaled from 160/130/100/70 to 100
  • Glimpse cooldown reduced from 65/50/35/20 to 60/46/32/18
  • Kinetic Fieldcooldown reduced from 14/13/12/11 to 13/12/11/10
  • Static Stormcooldown from 85 to 90/80/70

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml: • Elder Dragon Formlevel 3 now maintains theCorrosive Breathability from levels 1 and 2

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml:
• Illusions now benefit from theMarksmanshipbonus
    • Illusions will still lose the bonus if an enemy is nearby

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Rolling Boulderno longer reduces attack speed by 80 for 2 seconds
  • Rolling Boulder no longer does an additional 45 damage when used with a stone remnant
  • Rolling Boulder base damage increased from 90 to 100

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml: • Enchant Totemmana cost reduced from 50 to 20/30/40/50

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Astral Spiritdamage reduced from 60/100/140/180 to 60/90/120/150
  • Fixed a few cases where Elder Titan could move his Astral Spirit while castingEcho Stomp

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml: • Basemovement speedincreased from 315 to 335

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Time Walkno longer slows attack speed
  • Chronospherecooldown increased from 130/110/90 to 130/115/100
  • Wardunit types are no longer able to attack while inside the Chronosphere

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Call Downarea of effect increased from 450 to 600
  • Call Down missile one slow amount reduced from 50% to 30%
  • Call Down missile two slow amount increased from 20% to 60%
  • Force Staffcan now be used onHoming Missile

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Inner Vitalitybase health regen from 2/4/6/8 to 10
  • Inner Vitality regen bonus when hurt form 30/45/60/75% to 20/40/60/80%

label: Io
descriptionHtml: • No longer requiresturningto perform any actions

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml: • Liquid Firedamage reduced from 15/20/25/30 to 12/16/20/24

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml:
• Baseagilityincreased from 20 to 26
  • Blade Dancecritical strike chance rescaled from 15/20/25/35% to 20/25/30/35%

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml:
• Chakra Magicmana cost from 25/45/65/85 to 25/35/45/55
  • Blinding Lightblind duration increased from 3/4/5 to 4/5/6

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• X Marks the Spotenemy delay from 1/2/3/4 to 4, and allied delay from 2/4/6/8 to 8
  • X Marks the Spot cast range from 500/650/800/950 to 350/550/750/1000
  • X Marks the Spot cooldown from 14/13/12/11 to 19/16/13/10
  • X Marks the Spot Returnmana cost reduced from 50 to 0

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml:
• Diabolic Edictduration increased from 8 to 10 seconds
  • Lightning Stormslow duration increased from 0.5 to 0.75
  • Lightning Storm cast range increased from 700 to 800

label: Lich
descriptionHtml: • Chain Frostcooldown from 145/115/60 to 120/90/60

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml:
• Infestnow allows you to control the unit you are in using a sub-ability
    • Allows you to take control of the unit you are infesting, including their abilities
    • If you take control of a unit, it will maintain its cover, however it will become attackable by your enemy
    • Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed
    • Cannot be used on heroes

label: Lina
descriptionHtml:
• Attack projectile speed from 900 to 1000
  • Dragon Slavedamage increased from 100/170/230/280 to 110/180/250/320
  • Dragon Slave mana cost increased from 90/105/125/140 to 100/115/130/145
  • Light Strike Arraydamage rescaled from 90/150/210/280 to 120/160/200/240
  • Light Strike Array mana cost increased from 90/100/110/125 to 100/110/120/130
  • Light Strike Array stun duration increased from 1.6/1.8/2/2.2 to 1.6/1.9/2.2/2.5
  • Fiery Soulduration increased from 9 to 10

label: Lion
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack damage increased by 7
  • Mana Draindrain interval from 0.25 to 0.1
    • Kills illusions on the first tick

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml:
• Removed the cast time onSpirit Bear'sReturn
  • Battle Crycooldown increased from 30 to 60
  • Battle Cry duration reduced from 8 to 6
  • Battle Cry bonus damage increased from 20/40/60 to 50/75/100
  • Battle Cry bonus armor increased from 2/4/6 to 5/10/15

label: Luna
descriptionHtml:
• Moon Glaivelevel 4 bounces increased from 5 to 6
  • Eclipsebeam count increased from 4/7/10 to 5/8/11 (Scepterincreased from 4/8/12 to 6/10/14)

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml: • Divided We Standrespawn time reduction now 20% instead of 10/20/30%

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml: • Adaptive Strikestun max duration increased from 0.75/1.5/2.25/3 to 1.25/2.25/3.25/4.25

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack damage increased by 4
  • Crippling Fearmana cost reduced from 90 to 50
  • Darknessnow sets all enemy vision to a maximum of 675, instead of reducing it by 25%
    • This includes Wards, Buildings, etc.
  • Darkness no longer pauses the day/night timer
  • Darkness duration from 40/60/80 to 50
  • Darkness cooldown reduced from 180/150/120 to 160/120/80

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Fireblastdamage reduced from 60/120/180/240 to 55/110/165/220
  • Fireblast cast range reduced from 600 to 475

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Astral Imprisonmentintelligence steal increased from 4/6/8/10 to 4/7/10/13
  • Astral Imprisonment intelligence steal duration reduced from 60 to 50

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Coup de Gracecritical strike damage from 250/350/450% to 230/340/450%

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Supernovaattacks required to destroy increased from 5/7/10 to 5/8/11
  • FixedStop Icarus Diveability sometimes being interrupted by auto-attacks

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml: • Meat Hookrange increased from 700/900/1100/1300 to 1000/1100/1200/1300

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Decrepifymovement slow on allies reduced from 50% to 25%
  • Nether Wardattacks required to destroy increased from 3 to 4
  • Blademailno longer reflects Nether Ward damage onto Pugna

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml:
• Blinkrange increased from 700/850/1000/1150 to 1300
  • Blink cooldown from 12/10/8/6 to 15/12/9/6
  • Sonic Wavenow doesPureDamage and affectsSpell Immune
  • Sonic Wave damage reduced from 350/475/600 to 290/390/490 (Scepterreduced from 350/530/725 to 325/450/575)

label: Riki
descriptionHtml:
• Blink Strikemax charges increased from 3/4/5 to 4/5/6
  • Blink Strike charge restore time increased from 30 to 35
  • Blink Strike bonus damage from 50/70/90 to 40/70/100

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml:
• Fade Boltmana cost from 150 to 120/130/140/150
  • ScepterSpell Stealcooldown reduced from 5 to 2

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml: • Shadowrazedamage increased from 75/150/225/300 to 100/175/250/325

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Glaives of Wisdomintelligence into damage bonus from 30/48/66/84% to 30/50/70/90%
  • Last Wordcooldown reduced from 36/28/20/12 to 30/24/18/12
  • ScepterGlobal Silenceno longer increases duration by 1 second

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml: • Baseagilityreduced from 18 to 13

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml:
• Sprintduration reduced from 20 to 16
  • Sprint cooldown reduced from 28 to 23
  • Amplify Damagecooldown reduced from 10 to 5

label: Slark
descriptionHtml: • Pouncedamage reduced from 60/120/180/240 to 55/110/165/220

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml:
• Shrapnelno longer does damage to buildings
  • Shrapnel now has 3 charges with a 40 second replenish time
    • Shrapnel's slow and damage does not stack with itself
  • Shrapnel mana cost reduced from 120 to 50
  • Shrapnel duration increased from 9 to 10

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml: • Empowering Hastecooldown from 20 to 16

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Turn Rateimproved from 0.6 to 0.8

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• Warcryduration increased from 7 to 8 seconds
  • ScepterGod's Strengthally bonus damage from 40/60/80% to 50/75/100%

label: Techies
descriptionHtml:
• Added toCaptains Mode
    • Will be enabled next week
  • Land Minesdamage increased from 225/300/375/450 to 300/375/450/525

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Reflectioncast point reduced from 0.5 to 0.3
  • Sunderminimum HP from 25/20/15% to 20%

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml:
• Basemovementspeed reduced by 5
  • Ravagedamage reduced from 200/325/450 to 200/290/380

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml: • Heat-Seeking Missiledamage increased from 100/175/250/325 to 125/200/275/350

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:
• Tossduration increased from 1 to 1.3 seconds
  • Growmove speed bonus rescaled from 20/40/60 to 40/50/60

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• Eyes In The Forest'sOvergrowthdamage increased from 135 to 175 per second
  • Eyes In The Forest cooldown reduced from 55 to 25

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml: • FixedFervorstack count being 1 stack too slow

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Shardsprojectile speed from 900 to 1100
  • Ice Shards shard duration from 5 to 7 seconds
  • Walrus PUNCH!is now an enemy target ability, and is auto-castable
  • Walrus PUNCH! cooldown reduced from 25/20/15 to 20/16/12

label: Undying
descriptionHtml:
• Soul Ripmax units from 5/10/15/20 to 10/12/14/16
  • Soul Rip damage/heal per unit from 25 to 18/22/26/30
  • Tombstonearmor increased by 1
  • Flesh Golemmax slow increased from 15 to 20%

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Wave of Terrorcooldown increased from 15 to 20

label: Visage
descriptionHtml: • Gravekeeper's Cloakrecovery time from 12/10/8/6 to 6

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Fatal Bondscast range increased from 800 to 900
  • Fatal Bonds radius increased from 575 to 700

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Powershottravel range increased from 1825 to 2600
  • Powershot max damage is now dealt after 1 second channel instead of 0.7
    • It always channeled to 1 previously
  • Powershot cast point improved from 0.3 to 0
  • Reduced the area of the lingering vision at the end of Powershot from 800 to 400
  • Focus Fireattack speed bonus increased from 400 to 500

label: Animal Courier
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 150 to 120

label: Armlet of Mordiggian
descriptionHtml: • Recipecost reduced from 600 to 500

label: Blink Dagger
descriptionHtml: • Blinkis no longer disabled if you take no damage (e.g.Spiked Carapace,Refraction, etc.)

label: Bottle
descriptionHtml:
• Acouriercarrying a non-full bottle will always be slowed
    • Instead of only slowing when carrying an empty bottle

label: Broadsword
descriptionHtml: • ReplacedTalisman of EvasionwithBroadswordin theSide Shop

label: Circlet
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 185 to 165 (Null Talisman,Wraith Band, andBracerRecipe costs increased by 20)

label: Clarity
descriptionHtml: • Manarestore increased from 135 to 150

label: Crimson Guard
descriptionHtml: • Guardduration increased from 9 to 10

label: Diffusal Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Diffusal Blade is no longer aUnique Attack Modifier
  • MultipleMana Breaktype abilities do not stack

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml: • Endurancecharges increased from 5 to 6

label: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 500 to 650

label: Healing Salve
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 115 to 110

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml: • Dominatedunit bonus health increased from 250 to 500

label: Magic Wand
descriptionHtml: • Max charges increased from 15 to 17

label: Medallion of Courage
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe cost increased from 200 to 325
  • Valorcan now be cast on allies to give them armor
  • Passive armor and exchange armor increased from 6 to 7

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe cost reduced from 900 to 800
  • Barrierduration increased from 10 to 12

label: Refresher Orb
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown increased from 185 to 195

label: Shadow Amulet
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 1600 to 1400
  • Your movement is now only interrupted when the invisibility starts rather than when you cast it
